Name: Escape from Deathmark Dungeon
About the game: Escape from Deathmark Dungeon is a game by Matt Lloyd written in 2022 You were travelling through the wilderness on return from an adventure when in the middle of the night you were kidnapped by monsters, taken to their dungeon and imprisoned. However, using your ingenuity you managed to escape - this is the tale of your escape from that dungeon. Escape from Deathmark Dungeon is a fast paced action semi-roguelike fought over seven dungeon worlds with one of two characters. It is played from an isometric viewpoint as your character bashes and crashes their way through the stony dungeons. FEATURES Lots of spells and weapons Monsters - Dark Elves, Undead, Goblins and Beasts Fast Paced Action INCLUDES Full c# Source code is included for those who find such interesting to play around with.
